name: Iced Custard
description: Delicious. Needs minimum of a week steep cap on in the dark.
author: BrinNutz

reviews.text: I think the Cap VC should be lowered to 6%. 10% is just too buttery for me. This would take 3 months to steep.
I liked it after the first few days. Simple but tasty.  Now, after ~2 weeks steeping it's a little to thick for my taste.
